      • getClientName

        public String getClientName(String clientId)
        Get the name of a client.
        Parameters:
        clientId - the ID of the client whose name should be returned. Can be null get the name of the current client.
        Returns:
        the name of the client or null if the client does not exist

      • getProperty

        Returns:

      • isGlobalClient

        public boolean isGlobalClient()
